Package com.duocardgame

Class ActionCard

java.lang.Object
com.duocardgame.Card
com.duocardgame.ActionCard
public class ActionCard extends Card
Represents an action card in the game which has a specific action type and associated behavior when played.

This card extends the basic Card class and adds functionality for various game actions such as DRAW_TWO, REVERSE, SKIP, WILD, WILD_DRAW_FOUR, and SHUFFLE_HANDS.

    • isPlayable

      public boolean isPlayable(Card topCard)
      Checks if this action card is playable on top of the given card.

      An action card is playable if it is a wild card (WILD, WILD_DRAW_FOUR, or SHUFFLE_HANDS), or if its color matches the top card's color, or if both cards are action cards with the same action type.

      Specified by:
      isPlayable in class Card
      Parameters:
      topCard - the card currently on top of the discard pile
      Returns:
      true if this card can be played on top of the given card; false otherwise

    • executeEffect

      public void executeEffect(IGameMediator mediator)
      Executes the effect of this action card using the provided game mediator.

      The effect varies based on the ActionType:

      • DRAW_TWO: Forces the next player to draw two cards.
      • REVERSE: Reverses the direction of play.
      • SKIP: Skips the next player's turn.
      • WILD: Allows the player to choose a new color.
      • WILD_DRAW_FOUR: Allows the player to choose a new color and forces the next player to draw four cards.
      • SHUFFLE_HANDS: Shuffles the hands among players and allows choosing a new color.

      Specified by:
      executeEffect in class Card
      Parameters:
      mediator - the game mediator that controls the game flow and state

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this action card.

      The string representation consists of the card's color and action type.

      Specified by:
      toString in class Card
      Returns:
      a string representing the action card
